name: ColorContrast
description:
FOR BEST EXPERIENCE, WEAR HEADPHONES

A meditative platforming experience about facing yourself

Created by LucinaOrly for Mini Jam 111

A physics-based platformer with a zen-like atmosphere. Explore the area through portals. Collect suns and avoid your pursuers. 

Controls:

- Jump: Spacebar / A (Generic Gamepad)

-Move: WASD / Arrow Keys / Left Joystick

Version 0.2:

-Changed spawn position

Version 0.1 (TEST DEMO):

- Submission to Mini Jam 111

- Single map. More maps are to be added.

Bug:

- Player has a chance of falling through the floor on spawn
